name: The Forces of Time and Death
name_original: The Forces of Time and Death
description:
A platformer game in which dying helps you, and time travel is normal. WASD, arrows or mobile to move (tap the side of the screen to move that way and move your finger up to jump).  Use the buttons at the top left of the screen to reset and control time, or use E and R.

All assets and code was created by me.

Inspired by Sometimes You Die: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.stollenmayer.philipp.SometimesYouDie&hl=en&gl=US

The sound might not play, I don’t know why.
